item.title: Meet the Band
item.description: Ned Harry James Willy the Whale Hugh Will Young Uwa Katie Harrie Georgia Ned Ned

item.title: New Website
item.description: It was a long time ago that I was asked to make a website for DFO. I hate making websites and I never want to do this again James

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the DFO Website! We are DFO and we are here to tell you that we funk for money! Dot’s Funk Odyssey (DFO to our friends) are a 14 piece funk band based in Oxford, UK. We love to perform, and we’re ideal for getting audiences dancing, wiggling and having a good time! We play at many types of event, including balls, charity gigs, festivals and private functions. Playing everything from Stevie Wonder to Cee-Lo Green and from Aretha Franklin to Chaka Khan and Mark Ronson, our constantly updated set lists are guaranteed to be packed with songs that audiences just love to dance to.
